meanings.definition: The inside seam of a pair of pants, running from the crotch to the bottom of the leg.
meanings.sent1: She checked the inseam of the pants to see if they would fit.
meanings.sent2: The tailor adjusted the inseam of the trousers for a better fit.
meanings.sent3: The inseam of the jeans decided to take a break and unravelled itself.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to perfection was like the inseam of a well-tailored suit, seamless and precise.
meanings.sent5: The inseam of the pants whispered the secret of comfort and style.

meanings.sent3: The tailor decided to inseam the pants blindfolded for a fun challenge.
